title: Episode 169: Mr. One Nut
description:
This week, we are going way back to of the first few episodes we ever recorded. This was a bonus episode, and you can find dozens more of shows exclusively for Patrons here: https://www.patreon.com/patdown

In this episode, the gang discusses youth sports, creepy gym teachers, and how being stinky and poor saved Ms.Pat from sexual assault. Ms. Pat also discusses her love of free school and her jealousy of middle-class lunches.

- Get the Crack Baby T-Shirt! https://www.mspatcomedy.com/product/crack-baby-t-shirt/
- Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/patdown
- Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/patdown
- Website: https://www.mspatcomedy.com/
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
